channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Login as User or Customer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Login as User or Customer

item.title: CVE-2022-4305|2024-08-03T01:34:50.042Z -- unknown -- login%20as%20user%20or%20customer
item.description: The Login as User or Customer WordPress plugin before 3.3 lacks authorization checks to ensure that users are allowed to log in as another one, which could allow unauthenticated attackers to obtain a valid admin session.

item.title: CVE-2023-7247|2024-03-11T18:08:58.602Z -- unknown -- login%20as%20user%20or%20customer
item.description: The Login as User or Customer WordPress plugin through 3.8 does not prevent users to log in as any other user on the site.

item.title: CVE-2023-7247|2024-08-02T08:57:35.034Z -- unknown -- login%20as%20user%20or%20customer
item.description: The Login as User or Customer WordPress plugin through 3.8 does not prevent users to log in as any other user on the site.
